Name: Jessie 'Boom' James - a jigsaw chess tale
About the game: An innovative jigsaw puzzle with chess-shaped pieces. Solve the puzzles to follow the story of Jesse 'Boom' James, one of the wildest gunslinger from our Wild Wild Chess game. Featuring: Innovative chess-shaped jigsaw puzzle; Play it with regular jigsaw pieces as well; Uncover the story of Jesse 'Boom' James by solving 6 different jigsaw puzzles; 4 different sizes for each game mode: Chess-shaped pieces (98, 148, 327 or 580 pieces) and regular pieces (66, 144, 220 or 510 pieces) Beautiful soundtrack;
